name: Platformer Demo (Petster12)
description:
After the finale of The Search for Tippy, I wanted to make another game, and I also wanted to branch out from the RPG Maker software and sort of do it myself. So after a couple weeks of learning Game Maker Studio 2, I present to you... Something...

Just a basic platformer layout with some NPCs and and Item. I've added some systems like Inventory (ty Shaun Spalding)  and Dialogue (ty FriendlyCosmonaut) that I hope to use later on.

This is just the foundation for more to come and I'm really excited to get more in-depth to this.

Game Objective:

Talk to the Smoking Hot Orange Knight and Complete the Quest!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump/Interact (Double Jump Available)

Shift: Dash

Press E for Inventory

Press T to see a debug mode

------------------

Tiles provided by Shaun Spalding Tutorial

Sprites from https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Music I made in FL Studio 20
